title: "Top 7 Baselines For Image Recognition"
excerpt: "SVHN is obtained from house numbers in Google Street View images. SVHN was introduced to develop machine learning and object recognition algorithms with a minimal requirement on data preprocessing and formatting. In this paper, a simple procedure called AutoAugment is defined to automatically search for improved data augmentation policies."
